meta.description: Defines available consensus mechanisms, their resource requirements, and tier availability.

gossip.name: Gossip Protocol
gossip.description: Epidemic broadcast for efficient information dissemination.

crdt.name: CRDT
crdt.description: Conflict-free Replicated Data Types for automatic merge.

merkle_tree.name: Merkle Tree
merkle_tree.description: Cryptographic hash tree for efficient verification.

simple_bft.name: Simple BFT
simple_bft.description: Simplified BFT for safety-critical robotics and prototyping.

tangent_space_gossip.name: Tangent Space Gossip
tangent_space_gossip.description: Projects neighbors to local Tangent Space for linear averaging.

hyperbolic_tree_aggregation.name: Hyperbolic Tree Aggregation
hyperbolic_tree_aggregation.description: Embeds consensus tree in Hyperbolic Metric for fast aggregation.

symplectic_geometry.name: Symplectic Geometry Consensus
symplectic_geometry.description: Consensus preserving symplectic structure for physics-based systems.

geometric_median.name: Geometric Median Consensus
geometric_median.description: Robust aggregation minimizing sum of distances (Weiszfeld algorithm).

horosphere_bft.name: Horosphere BFT
horosphere_bft.description: Consensus propagates along horospheres; Byzantine faults create horospherical singularities.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Horospheres in H^n (equidistant surfaces from ideal points at infinity)
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus propagates along horospheres, Byzantine faults create 'horospherical singularities'
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes violating horospherical equidistance are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for hyperbolic distance computation, O(n) for horosphere validation

ideal_boundary_bft.name: Ideal Boundary BFT
ideal_boundary_bft.description: Consensus states live on ideal boundary; geodesic convergence guarantees agreement.

blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus states live on ideal boundary, geodesic convergence guarantees agreement
blueprint.fault_detection: Byzantine nodes create 'non-convergent' geodesics to boundary
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for boundary points, O(n log n) for geodesic validation

poincare_disk_bft.name: Poincaré Disk BFT
poincare_disk_bft.description: Consensus via Möbius transformations on the unit disk.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Möbius transformations preserving the unit disk
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus operations as Möbius transformations, Byzantine detection via transformation group properties
blueprint.fault_detection: Transformations not preserving the disk indicate Byzantine behavior
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for Möbius operations, O(n log n) for disk preservation

null_geodesic_bft.name: Null Geodesic BFT
null_geodesic_bft.description: Consensus propagates along null geodesics; faults create light cone singularities.

blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus propagates along null geodesics, Byzantine faults create 'light cone singularities'
blueprint.fault_detection: Messages violating null geodesic constraints are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for null geodesic computation, O(n) for constraint validation

spherical_bft.name: Spherical BFT
spherical_bft.description: Consensus paths follow great circles; antipodal states indicate faults.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Great circles as geodesics on S^n
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus paths follow great circles, Byzantine nodes create 'antipodal singularities'
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes proposing antipodal states (maximally separated) are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for spherical distances, O(n log n) for great circle validation

stereographic_bft.name: Stereographic Projection BFT
stereographic_bft.description: Project consensus to plane for computation; validate on sphere.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Conformal mapping between sphere and plane
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Project consensus to plane for computation, validate on sphere
blueprint.fault_detection: Projections creating 'poles' (projection singularities) indicate Byzantine behavior
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for projection, O(n log n) for conformal validation

building_geometry_bft.name: Building Geometry BFT
building_geometry_bft.description: Consensus in apartment systems of affine buildings.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Affine buildings as discrete analogues of symmetric spaces
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus in apartment systems, Byzantine faults create 'non-convex' chambers
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes violating building axioms (apartment systems) are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for building distance, O(n) for apartment validation

randers_metric_bft.name: Randers Metric BFT
randers_metric_bft.description: Consensus with 'wind' effects (beta field); faults create metric singularities.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: F(x,v) = √(g_ij v^i v^j) + β_i v^i where β is a 1-form
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus with 'wind' effects (β field), Byzantine nodes create metric singularities
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes creating 'headwind' preventing consensus are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for Randers metric, O(n log n) for β-field validation

liouville_theorem_bft.name: Liouville's Theorem BFT
liouville_theorem_bft.description: Consensus via conformal mappings; rigidity theorem provides fault detection.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Conformal maps in dimension ≥ 3 are Möbius transformations
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus via conformal mappings, rigidity theorem provides Byzantine detection
blueprint.fault_detection: Non-Möbius conformal transformations indicate Byzantine behavior
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for conformal factors, O(n log n) for Liouville validation

hyperbolic_random_graph_bft.name: Hyperbolic Random Graph BFT
hyperbolic_random_graph_bft.description: Consensus in tree-like graph structures; faults violate delta-hyperbolicity.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Random graphs with hyperbolic geometry (Gromov hyperbolicity)
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus in tree-like graph structures, Byzantine nodes violate δ-hyperbolicity
blueprint.network_profile: O(n log n) for hyperbolic embedding
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for hyperbolicity testing, O(n) for tree approximation

gromov_boundary_bft.name: Gromov Boundary BFT
gromov_boundary_bft.description: Consensus converges to boundary points of delta-hyperbolic spaces.

blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus converges to boundary points, Byzantine nodes prevent convergence
blueprint.network_profile: O(n log n) for boundary points
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for boundary convergence, O(n) for asymptotic validation
